references: Related: CF 187311, CF 187582, CF 187547, CF 187589. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 2 and 3, Block 128, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition; north one-half of Lots 1, 2 and 3, Block 11, Wood's South Division of Green Lake Addition; Lots 3 and 4, Block 13, Mercer's Addition; and Lot 2 of Block 35 and Lot 3 of Block 36, Woodlawn Addition to Green Lake; with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-170.
